snippet: To the Editor:     The unfairness of the reliance on advanced-placement courses in measuring merit for university admissions in California is even more pernicious than you argue (editorial, Aug. 9)....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The unfairness of the reliance on advanced-placement courses in measuring merit for university admissions in California is even more pernicious than you argue (editorial, Aug. 9).
abstract: Letter from Prof Ronald Takaki agrees with Aug 9 editorial on unfairness of reliance on advanced-placement courses in measuring merit for university admissions in California
